com.meterware.simplestub

Class StaticStubSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.meterware.simplestub.StaticStubSupport

  • public abstract class StaticStubSupport
extends Object
    A class which simplifies the assignment of stubs to static variables.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  StaticStubSupport.Momento
      Deprecated. 
      use Memento instead.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static StaticStubSupport.Momento install(Class<?> containingClass, String fieldName, Object newValue)
      This method assigns the specified value to the named field in the specified class.
      static StaticStubSupport.Momento preserve(Class<?> containingClass, String fieldName)
      This method returns a StaticStubSupport.Momento object which can be used to revert the specified field to its current value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • install

        public static StaticStubSupport.Momento install(Class<?> containingClass,
                                String fieldName,
                                Object newValue)
                                         throws NoSuchFieldException
        This method assigns the specified value to the named field in the specified class. It returns a StaticStubSupport.Momento object which can be used to revert that field to its original value.
        Parameters:
        containingClass - the class on which the static field is defined.
        fieldName - the name of the static field.
        newValue - the value to place into the static field.
        Returns:
        an object which holds the information needed to revert the static field.
        Throws:
        NoSuchFieldException - if the named field does not exist.

      • preserve

        public static StaticStubSupport.Momento preserve(Class<?> containingClass,
                                 String fieldName)
                                          throws NoSuchFieldException
        This method returns a StaticStubSupport.Momento object which can be used to revert the specified field to its current value.
        Parameters:
        containingClass - the class on which the static field is defined.
        fieldName - the name of the static field.
        Returns:
        an object which holds the information needed to revert the static field.
        Throws:
        NoSuchFieldException - if the named field does not exist.
